data.name: پیروزان
data.description: Pirouzan Group is a holding company with a focus on R&D, innovation, and consulting to provide cross-industry solutions through its subsidiaries. As a trusted partner, we bring together brilliant minds from all over the world in a playful and stimulating environment to build and bring to market innovative solutions. By utilizing our world-class international ecosystem of diverse partners across a broad range of industries, we are leading the way into a prosperous future.
